item.title: Testing my CMS
item.description: I was bored so I decided to set up Netlify CMS, this post will show if it works properly. This post will also be for testing certain features of the website.

item.title: How this website is hosted
item.description:
Foreword: I am not sponsored, nor endorsed by any of the companies/programs shown here

Introduction Link to heading

Hello, welcome to my first real blog post. Today, were going over how this website was made. All of it is generated using Hugo. Hugo is a program that will generate a website from Markdown files. It makes making a website a breeze, this blogpost was entirely written in markdown.

item.title: Welcome to my blog
item.description: Welcome to my blog/website, I will use this to post new projects and random stuff.
